page.title: 03Leisure and recreation.
page.content: In{Tintagel}there is no cinema,sports complex or a public swimming pool,but the pool at the Wharncliffe Hotel is open to the to the public. In the summer most people go to the beach for swimming,surfing and fishing.Other outdoor recreations include horse_riding,cricket and football although{Tintagel}Football club did not win one match last season.B.M.X. bike riding is very popular and there is a B.M.X. track at the Playing Fields.There is also an adventure play ground,a fun and fitness course,crazy golf,tennis court and swings. In the village there is an amusment arcade,greatly enjoyed by local children and tourists.It has gambling machines and video games. A new golf course is being constructed on the cliffs near The Castle Hotel.
